sentences.en: A brutish man knoweth not; neither doth a fool understand this.
sentences.cn: 畜类人不 晓得 ,愚顽人也不明白.

sentences.en: But its brutish behaviour will probably backfire.
sentences.cn: 但是这种鲁莽行为可能让俄国自食其果.

sentences.en: Human existence is both physically and spiritual. That is to say, human have both brutish - divine nature.
sentences.cn: 人的存在既是物质性的也是精神性的,换言之, 人既有兽性也有神性.

sentences.en: Indeed, some point out that Britain has a long history of brusque and occasional brutish behavior.
sentences.cn: 的确, 有些人指出英国有长久的粗鲁和偶尔粗鲁的行为.

sentences.en: Koreans and Chinese, on the other hand, are depicted as swarthy, brutish and slit - eyed.
sentences.cn: 而韩国人和中国人的形象则是黑皮肤, 小眼睛而且粗野不堪.

sentences.en: The enjoyment of others is brutish.
sentences.cn: 其他人的胃口都是粗俗的.

sentences.en: The man was brutish and coarse.
The Mesabi Iron Range, a brutish stretch of maroon hillocks ( John McCormick ) See Synonyms at brute.
sentences.cn: 梅萨比艾恩山是褐紫红色山脉中艰险的一段 ( 约翰·麦考密克 ) 参见.

sentences.en: The poor people lived in brutish conditions.
sentences.cn: 穷苦的人生活在牛马不如的环境中.

sentences.en: Though Screed was not initially impressed with such brutish methods, he kept an open mind.
sentences.cn: 斯克里德虽然一开始对这种野蛮的做法不以为然, 但也并不介意.

sentences.en: Understand , ye brutish among the people: and ye fools , when will ye be wise?
sentences.cn: 你们民间的畜类人当思想.你们愚顽人, 到几时才有智慧 呢 .

sentences.en: Whoso loveth instruction loveth knowledge: but he that hateth reproof is brutish.
sentences.cn: 1喜爱管教的,就是喜爱知识.恨恶责备的,却是畜类.

words.tran_cn: 极干的（尤指香槟酒）；粗糙的
残忍的；野蛮的，不讲理的
残酷地对待；使像野兽般残忍，使变得残酷无情
粗野的；残忍的；野兽般的

trans.tran_en: If you describe a person or their behaviour as brutish, you think that they are brutal and uncivilized
